title: Cinema Club Membership
description: Join the Fort Kent Cinema family and enjoy exclusive benefits all year long. Our Cinema Club members are the heart of our community.

plans.name: Movie Lover
plans.description: Perfect entry point for occasional moviegoers
perks: $1 off ALL movie tickets (matinee & evening)
$1 off ALL popcorn sizes
FREE small popcorn on your birthday month
Member pricing on private rentals (10% off)
Early email notice of special screenings
plans.valueCallout: See just 3 movies with popcorn and you’ve already saved your membership cost!

plans.name: Cinema Fan
plans.description: For regular moviegoers who want real savings
perks: $2 off ALL evening tickets ($10 instead of $12)
$1 off matinee tickets ($7 instead of $8)
$1 off small popcorn
$2 off medium & large popcorn
FREE small popcorn on your birthday month
1 FREE movie pass upon joining
Member pricing on private rentals (15% off)
Invitation to 2 members-only screenings per year
plans.valueCallout: Your FREE welcome ticket plus 4 evening movies = membership paid for!

plans.name: Family Pass
plans.description: Real savings for families who love movie nights
perks: All Cinema Fan benefits for up to 4 family members
$2 off ALL tickets for up to 4 people per visit
$2 off ALL popcorn sizes
2 FREE movie passes upon joining
1 FREE large popcorn per family visit
Member pricing on birthday party packages (15% off)
Priority booking for private rentals
Invitation to all members-only screenings
plans.valueCallout: Family of 4 sees ONE movie? You just saved $10. See 2 movies and the membership is nearly paid for!

plans.name: Cinema Supporter
plans.description: For those who want to keep the theater thriving
perks: All Cinema Fan benefits
1 FREE movie ticket per month (12 tickets/year)
Name displayed on Supporter Wall in lobby
Special thank you in end-of-year newsletter
20% off private rentals & birthday packages
Behind-the-scenes annual tour or Q&A
Invitation to all members-only events
plans.valueCallout: Your monthly free ticket nearly covers the membership. Everything else is pure savings—plus you’re keeping your community cinema alive.

plans.name: Cinema Champion
plans.description: Ultimate support for your biggest fans
perks: All Supporter benefits
4 FREE movie tickets per month
Premium Supporter Wall recognition with custom message
1 FREE private screening per year (off-peak, 2 hours)
Reserved “Champion Seats” option
First choice on special event tickets
Annual appreciation gift
25% off all private rentals & birthday packages
plans.valueCallout: 48 free tickets per year is worth nearly $500. You’re getting $250+ in value while being the reason Fort Kent Cinema exists.

footer: Every membership keeps our projector running and our doors open. Thank you, Fort Kent.
